post.title: fs: apple iphone 3gs **black** 32gb **sealed**
post.content: this is a brand new sealed iphone 3gs,32gb and black color. its locked to fido but is unlockable. make/model: apple iphone 3gs (32gb) included: iphone+handsfree+usb+charger+box(sealed) carrier: fido retail: $799+tax location: north vancouver,bc,canada payment: paypal or cash for local shipping: yes. canada add $25 / usa add $30 (xpress w/tracking) notes: this is a new sealed iphone. locked to fido but im pretty sure u can unlock and jailbreak it. price: $699 cdn contacts: call/sms or email 778-865-2424
